name: GameForMiniJam101
description:
This is a mini-game for mini jam 101.

Tips:

A\D  to Move the Player, Space to Jump.

 Mouse left click the icon to select the "platform" and build it in the game.

Open the door go to the next level.

I hope you enjoy it, thank you for playing! :)

Credit:

Music: 

JumpyGame   by  Rizwan Ashraf

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-music-tracks-for-games-15...
